Sammamish.KJR-FM: KJR-FM (95.7 FM) is a Seattle, Washington, radio station that is broadcasting a classic hits format. It operates at 95.7 MHz with 100,000 watts effective radiated power with a transmitter near Issaquah, Washington on Cougar Mountain, and also on the Internet via streaming audio and operates from its studios in Seattle's Belltown neighborhood northwest of downtown. KJR-FM is owned by iHeartMedia.
